Name: SAP ERP
External Service Providers/Suppliers: beyond expectation GmbH;#15;#Deloitte Extended;#19;#ECOSIO;#107;#AXXEDO AG;#91;#Fulcrum;#158;#IPO.Plan GmbH;#124;#bin;#150;#ITML;#26;#Ixenso;#85;#Kanbanize;#82;#Open Text Software Austria;#31;#Kardex Austria GmbH;#63;#Opentext France;#84;#MAZAK;#111;#KPMG advisory S.p.A.;#97;#Pama;#108;#SANA;#114;#TPG The Project Group Austria;#86;#Top Flow GmbH;#38;#TESI SpA;#94;#SOPRA STERIA GROUP S.A.;#11;#ShipERP;#104;#SCHEER;#141;#SAP Österreich;#7;#Sana Commerce SA B.V.;#115;#Sivis Professional Services AG;#35;#Seal France;#83;#sana;#116;#Piteco;#49;#Oxford;#151;#Seal Systems;#32;#authentic;#143;#CNT;#126
Description: SAP is the central ERP-software for handling business processes within the HTI-Group companies such as accounting, controlling, purchasing, production, quality management, logistics, service and sales. Various software applications have an interface to SAP, such as TeamCenter. SAP will replace the other ERP-Systems in the future.

Name: SEAL systems
Description: SEAL SYSTEMS provides solutions for output managment, This consist in Extracting, converting data and documents to produce digital or paper ouptus. The output management system from SEAL Systems provides device-neutral, secure and entirely transparent document and information distribution from SAP.  In our Group SEAL solutions are used for outputing data from SAP gatering document + data in oder to generate complex and composite outputs from SAP. In addition to this, SEAL is proposing solutions to Administer Prinoting from SAP.

Name: OpenText ECM Suite
Description: Regardless if paper, email or office document, all business documents are securely archived and attached to SAP transactions and processes. Content is stored on a secure and scalable archive server, where it is managed on hard disk–based storage systems from  storage platform vendors with enhanced security capabilities (e.g. WORM-feature and retention on hardware level).   In our Group, Opentext Archive server is a solution that manages document storage and archiving in all SAP Streams.  - OpenText Archiving for SAP Solutions - OpenText Document Access for SAP Solutions - OpenText Vendor Invoice Management for SAP Solutions

Name: Dropbox
Description: Dropbox is a cloud based service that synchronizes files stored in the Dropbox folder on the PC in the background with the cloud. Alternatively, files can also be uploaded via the Internet browser. Files can be saved in different folders and shared with other users, whereby individual read and write permissions can be assigned.

Name: Intranet
Description: Together global is our internal intranet, which serves as a communication and information platform. Current news are published and all important documents, information and templates concerning the work and work safety as well as company guidelines can be found. Together global is based on SharePoint and also displays the SharePoint-Sites pages you have access to.

Name: Business Intelligence
Description: Power BI is a business analytics service that connects data from one or more data sources to each other, and transforms these data into stunning visuals in Order to visually explore and analyze the data in one view. Different dashbords can be created and shared, at the same time authorizations can be assigned to see individual or all data of the report.

Name: Microsoft Windows
Description: Microsoft Windows is the standard operating system of the HTI Group and is used by almost all employees. Windows 10 will become the default-version for the personal computing and will replace Windows 7. For servers the HTI group has serveral variants in useage.

Name: Microsoft Office
Description: Microsoft Office is the standard office suite of the HTI Group. It consists of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and Sype for Buisness.

Name: Microsoft Client & Rem. Access
Description: Microsoft Client and Remote Access is a tool for remote access to computers and servers. It allows external employees such as drafters and IT programmers to remotely access and work on the company's servers.

Name: Microsoft Project
Description: With Microsoft Project, projects can be planned, controlled and monitored. The project is displayed as a timeline and so necessary deadlines for project-steps, depending on project progress, can be calculated, resources can be managed, and a cost estimate can be calculated. MS Project is available in two versions, a single-user version (standard) and a server version (professional). Since the Professional version requires a Project Server, the Service Catalog contains the subcategories IT Project Mgmt, Ropeways Planning Leitner and - Poma.

Name: MS Project - IT Project Mgmt.
ServiceID Name: APP-01-11-001 MS Project - IT Project Mgmt.

Name: MS Project - Ropeways Plan. LTN
Key Users: HOLZER Erhard;#85;#NAGELE Rudolf;#87;#GOGL Matthias;#88;#OBEXER Christian;#91;#WINDISCH Georg;#106
ServiceID Name: APP-01-11-002 MS Project - Ropeways Plan. LTN
Description: MS Project - Ropeways Plan LTN is a process oriented Project Management tool which offers single and multi project perspectives. It links facilities and departments with each other and accompanies the planning. Dependencies on schedules and planned submissions of documents as well as necessary production and delivery steps can be displayed and planned. Planning data can be maintained directly on the JAVA Script Frontend or MS Project client which allows also resource planning.

Name: MS Project - Ropeways Plan. Poma
ServiceID Name: APP-01-11-003 MS Project - Ropeways Plan. Poma
Description: MS Project – Ropeways Plan. Poma is the Poma Project Portfolio Management system, which is based on MS Project, SAP Project Systems and TPG PSLink. The system provides consolidated views of projects and / or activities. It is used by Managers and project managers to pilot projects, define resource requirements and manage resources.

Name: Microsoft Visio Professional
Description: The visualization tool Microsoft Visio is offered in two versions, a standard and a professional version with extended program functionality. Since a large part of the users use the standard variant, no longer a distinction is made between Standard and Professional for internal billing and therefore a new WBS is created for Microsoft Visio, where the costs for both variants are allocated.

Name: Microsoft Visio Standard
Description: The visualization tool Microsoft Visio is offered in two versions, a standard and a professional version with extended program functionality. Since a large part of the users use the standard variant, no longer a distinction is made between Standard and Professional for internal billing and therefore a new WBS is created for Microsoft Visio, where the costs for both variants are allocated.

Name: Microsoft Visual Studio Prof.
Description: Microsoft Visual Studio is a development environment for the programming of Web-, Destop- and App-applications, which is supporting the common programming languages. At Leitner AG the software for example is used to setup/configure programs for different applications that will make processes easier, for example Material management for internal logistics.

Name: SharePoint & Teams
Description: Sharepoint is a web-based platform that makes so-called sites with search functions available to users. The sites can be individually designed and contain lists and document libraries with possible individual access rights per user. This allows several functions like document management system, individual lists (e.g. "Service Catalog", "Demand Portal"), team calendars etc. Processes and automatisms can be realized through workflows.

Name: Movex
Description: Movex is an old ERP system, which was used by many companies of the group. It is replaced by SAP.  Since February 2019 Movex is no longer used, but in a read-only mode for tax authorities.

Name: Orlando
Description: Orlando was used as an ERP-System by Prinoth, before they switched to SAP. Orlando is still in a display-only mode

Name: Averp
Description: Demaclenko used AVERP as their ERP-System, before switching to SAP. The Software now is in a display-only mode.

Name: Box
Description: Box is a file sharing system, which provides file sharing, collaborating, and other tools for working with files that are uploaded to its servers. Users can determine how their content can be shared with others.  Also Users can invite others to view and/or modify a shared files, upload documents and photos to a shared files folder. Files also can be shared outside of Box, so external users can view shared files

Name: Lotus Notes
Description: Lotus Notes is a platform that can make various databases available. A special of these databases is the mailbox, through which Lotus Notes also offers a complete email system. The LN databases can be personalized and expanded into specialized applications using forms, workflows and agents.

Name: MoovApps Business process m. BPM
ServiceID Name: APP-01-21 MoovApps Business process m. BPM

Name: Teamviewer
Description: Teamviewer is a remote administration tool and is used for customer support. The program is installed on both customer and the company computer. The customer computer can be remotely controlled via the Internet using authentication credentials to provide customer service.

Name: Adobe Acrobat Standard DC
Description: Adobe Acrobat is a free software for displaying PDFs. The software also provides simple editing options, e.g. inserting text or highlighting textpassages, as well as the option to digitally sign the document and comment on it for other users.

Name: Nitro Software
Key Users: FRANKCOM Murray;#807;#PENASA Christoph;#808;#MODENESE Mattia;#508;#WEICHS Eva-Maria;#809;#BALDO Caterina;#351;#GROSS Justin;#810
Description: Nitro can be used to edit PDFs by copying, deleting, erasing, blacken or modifying text, individual pages can be inserted, extracted or rotated, and a PDF File can be created from multiple files and datatypes. Optical character recognition also allows scanned PDFs to be searched and PDFs can be converted into Office files. Furthermore, documents can be digitally signed and provided with encryption with an individual access right.

Name: LinkedIn Learning
Description: This website can be used to have an overview of functionality of programs (eg. MS Excel) and trainings. An additional Point of usage is to use as a reference book for problems for various applications.

Name: In-house developed Software Poma
Description:
The following tools are in this IT Service:
 bddoctoolbox
BdDoc
BdTech
ConfigNotices
docQual
Calculs
 TracePAss
transport
UtilitairesAutocadRnn
Sales Opportunity Portfolio Management

Name: Adobe Photoshop
Description: Adobe Photoshop provides comprehensive tools for editing, cropping, and retouching photos. Objects can be removed or inserted from the image, colors can be changed, and virtual brushes, pens and markers can be used for drawing to create extraordinary artwork. Adobe Photoshop is part of the Adobe Creative Cloud-Suite

Name: Redmine Project management software
Description: Redmine is a free and open source, web-based project management and issue-tracking tool. It allows users to manage multiple projects and associated subprojects. It features per project wikis and forums, time tracking, and flexible, role-based access control. It includes a calendar and Gantt charts to aid visual representation of projects and their deadlines. Redmine integrates with various version control systems and includes a repository browser and different viewer.

Name: Adobe Illustrator
Description: Adobe Illustrator is the industry-standard vector graphics software, for creating sophisticated logos, icons, drawings, typography, and illustrations for print, web, video, and mobile. Add effects, manage styles, and edit individual characters to create typographic designs that perfectly express your messages.

Name: Adobe Creative Cloud
Description: Adobe Creative Cloud is a subscription service consisting of all common Adobe programs for photo and video editing (Photoshop, Lightroom, InDesign, Premiere Pro). Also included is a cloud storage to synchronize files and projects. In addition, Creative Cloud offers a platform with online courses for training around the included programs. The integrated Adobe Stock provides access to a large photo database

Name: Archiving ARXivar/IXCE
Description: Archiving ARXivar/IXCE is a tool to archive legally all invoices, delivery notes, VAT books and Journals, which have to be archived for 10 years due to legal reasons. Every uploaded document gets a unique ID, in order to be able to clearly identify it. The Archived documents can be listed, searched and sorted with this tool

Name: Proffix
Description: Proffix is an ERP for small business units. Based on the basic structure, additional modules can be switched very flexibly. BACO Treppenlifte is a business unit that operates detached from the usual HTI structures. Since the individual business processes are not similar to the ropeway sector, it was not economical to integrate them into SAP. For this an optimal solution was found with Proffix. The financial results of this area are periodically posted to SAP, making them accessible to the entire Group.

Name: Pass'IN Digital certificates
Description: Pass’IN” is a service provided by “Imprimerie Nationale”. They provide certificates for digital signature, with strong authentication and encryption, on cards looking like credit cards. They can be delivered via a process compliant with EIDAS standard, for digital signature of public contracts

Name: COGEP GuideTI
Description: Cogep GuideTI is our Computerized Maintenance Management Software. It is used by our Building Maintenance department in order to plan their preventive and corrective maintenance, keep track of their assets, manage work orders from employees.

Name: Adobe InDesign
Description: Adobe InDesign is the industry-leading page design software and layout app for creating and publishing beautiful documents for print and digital media. InDesign has everything you need to make posters, books, digital magazines, eBooks, interactive PDFs, and more.

Name: Pronet
Description: Pronet was the ERP-System of Agudio, before they switched to SAP. Due to legal reasons the system is in a display-only mode

Name: Monitor
Description: Lenko used MONITOR as their ERP-System, before they have been merged with Demac to Demaclenko in 2011. The Software now is in a display-only mode.

Name: Azure DevOps
Description: Azure DevOps is an Applications that provides version control, reporting, requirements management, project management (for both agile software development and waterfall teams), automated builds, testing and release management capabilities. It covers the entire application lifecycle, and enables DevOps capabilities. Azure DevOps can be used as a back-end to numerous integrated development environments (IDEs) but is tailored for Microsoft Visual Studio and Eclipse on all platforms.

Name: CorelDRAW
Description: CorelDraw is a suite of graphics and image editing applications that can be used to create technical and graphic drawings.

Name: Microsoft Dynamics Navision ERP
Description: Microsoft Dynamics Navision ERP was used by Prinoth Germany as their ERP-System, before they switched to SAP in August 2018. Now the Software is in a display-only mode due to legal reasons.

Name: MindManager
Description: MindManager (https://www.mindjet.com/) can be used as a “virtual whiteboard” for brainstorming, managing and planning projects, compiling research, organizing large amounts of information, and for strategic planning. Furthermore, MindManager also has features that allow budget calculations and formulas, Gantt chart views of project timelines, and guided brainstorming. Documents can be attached to mind map topics and viewed within the MindManager application. Links, images, and notes can also be added to mind map topics and viewed and searched in a side panel.

Name: NetSetMan Pro
Description: NetSetMan is a network settings manager software which can easily switch between your preconfigured profiles. Users will be able to group custom network parameters into profiles and apply them with just a click. This eliminate the need of configuring manually the network parameters reducing errors and speeding up things.

Name: Microsoft Visio
Description: Microsoft Viso is a visualization tool in which diagrams, organizational charts, maps, workflows and simple technical drawings can be quickly created with the help of shapes and templates. The diagram can be exported to common file formats or be made available to your team on SharePoint.

Name: SurveyMonkey SDO
Description: SurveyMonkey is an online (cloud based) survey software and provides customizable surveys, as well as a suite of paid back-end programs that include data analysis, sample selection, bias elimination, and data representation Tools. In addition, SurveyMonkey also offers more large-scale enterprise options for companies interested in data analysis, brand management, customer / employee feedback, and consumer-focused marketing.

Name: Powtoon Animation software
Description: Powtoon is Web-based animation software that allows users to create animated presentations by manipulating pre-created objects, imported images, provided music and user-created voice-overs.[5] Powtoon uses an Apache Flex engine to generate an XML file that can be played in the Powtoon online viewer, exported to YouTube or downloaded as an MP4 file.

Name: Visioaxess Visitor Management
Description:
Visioaxess is multi-function visitor management software that helps improve corporate image and security. EASY ACCESSPre-register your visitors and control entrance requirements.Review access records of visitors, hosts or businessesimmediately.Track the number of visitors in real time in order to ensurebuilding safety.

 
Link:http://www.visioaxess.com/en/home-visitor-management.html
 
Visioaxess is a client / server web or intranet applicationdeveloped in ASP.Net and is based on a powerful SQL Server databasesoftware. Visioaxess uses standard components already present inMicrosoft Windows and Windows Pro environments, ensuring easyinstallation and deployment in the enterprise.

Name: 4ward Phonecall Management
Description:
4ward has developed for its on-call service a solution for managing incoming calls. The solution in use can be easily adapted to the customer's needs for the on-call services.

The solution is completely customizable and can be integrated with any platform offering access to its data through databases or webservices and the functionalities (distribution / call forwarding) can be extended as desired.

Name: Wrike Project Management
Description: The Wrike project management software is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) product that enables its users to manage and track projects, deadlines, schedules, and other workflow processes. It also allows users to collaborate with one another. The application is available in English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese and Russian. The primary goal of the software is to help streamline workflow and allow companies to focus on core tasks.

Name: Lasernet Label Management
Description: The design of documents, their distribution and management are tasks  easy with Lasernet, because our connectors ensure full integration between  Lasernet and your ERP. Lasernet allows users to convert documents  from your ERP in electronic documents and distribute them in the format of  their choice.  The solution automates all document management processes and  allows the archiving of documents in PDF/A format. A print preview of the documents composed by Lasernet allows to  check the editions before sending them to your customers and partners.  The solution  also includes a set of pre-configured documents. Your communication with your customers, partners and suppliers is streamlined,  enabling your company to issue business documents that respect  your graphic charter, EDI files, e-mails, etc.

Name: Easescreen
Description: Digital displays can show digital images, video, web pages, weather data or text. They can be found in public spaces to provide usefu information.

Name: Antidote
Description: Antidote is a grammar correction and writing assistance software in French and English that includes a proofreader, ten dictionaries, ten language guides, a revision prism, an inspection prism and several other tools.

Name: TechSmith Camtasia
Description: Camtasia is a software suite for creating video tutorials and presentations directly via screencast, or via a direct recording plug-in to Microsoft PowerPoint. The screen area to be recorded can be chosen freely, and audio or other multimedia recordings may be recorded at the same time or added separately from any other source and integrated in the Camtasia component of the product. Both versions of Camtasia started as enhanced screen capture programs and have evolved to integrate screen capture and post-processing tools targeted at the educational and information multimedia development marketplace.

Name: Avrios Fleet management software
Description: Avrios is a web-based platform that enables customers to manage their fleet digitally. The platform adapts to the customer's needs. Internal processes and outsourced services are supported by digitization, web-based collaboration and continuous automation. https://www.avrios.com/overview/

Name: DocuSign Electronic Signature
Description: DocuSign pioneered the development of e-signature technology, and today DocuSign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements.   DocuSign value is simple to understand: legacy, paper-based agreement processes are manual, slow, expensive, and error-prone. DocuSign eliminates the paper, automate the process, and connect it to all the other systems that businesses are already using.  DocuSign allows you to quickly and securely make every agreement and approval digital, from almost anywhere in the world, on practically any device. It’s simple to use and implement, so even complex workflows can be automated, keeping your business moving forward, faster.  DocuSign automates manual, paper-based processes with the open, independent, standards-based digital transaction management (DTM) platform for managing all aspects of documented business transactions. Customers can open new accounts and start loans in minutes. The Company helps banks give customers the convenience of anywhere, anytime access for completing forms, contracts or lending documents. The Company works simply on any Internet connected device including all mobile devices. The Company offers a he following product editions with varying combinations of functionality: trial, single-user, multi-user, business pro, enterprise pro, standards-based signatures, ehanko, DocuSign transaction rooms for real estate, DocuSign payments, and enotary. In Trial user can send documents for signature, basic fields, such as signature, date, name, and text, mobile app, basic workflows, real-time audit trail, integration with Dropbox, Google Drive, and more, and multiple languages.

Name: Carrier Security Mgmt. Software ATS8600
ServiceID Name: APP-01-67 Carrier Security Mgmt. Software ATS8600
Description: The Security Mgmt. Software ATS8600 is a integrated Security Management Software for Intrusion/Access, Video and Fire surveillance providing facility and security managers with a clear view and control over these different functions.

Name: Aris Focus ERP
Description: Former ERP System of Semer SAS.  comany ARIS - ERP produt name FOCUS. Server SLEFCFOCUS hosted in Semer data room. This VM still exists as an archive. Focus Evolution was formerly their ERP system before SAP.  Maintenance of license was paid in 2019 (1561€/Y) https//www.aris-focus.com/focus-evolution-focus-web

Name: Microsoft Power Apps & Automate
Description: PowerApps and Power Automate (previously known as Flow) help people easily manipulate, surface, automate and analyse data and can be used with Office 365 and Dynamics 365 (as well as other third-party apps and other Microsoft services). Microsoft PowerApps is a low-code approach to custom app development, allowing users to quickly create apps with a point and click approach and without development knowledge. Microsoft Power Automate is a service allowing users to create automated workflows between their favorite apps and services to synchronize files, get notifications, collect data, and more.

Name: Zoom
Description: Zoom is a videotelephony software program that provides a video chatting service. Zoom is compatible with Windows, macOS, iOS, Android, Chrome OS, and Linux and it is noted for its simple interface and usability, regardless of technological expertise.  Features include one-on-one meetings, group video conferences, screen sharing, plugins, browser extensions, and the ability to record meetings and have them automatically transcribed.  Zoom security features include password-protected meetings, user authentication, waiting rooms, locked meetings, disabling participant screen sharing, randomly generated IDs, and the ability for the host to remove disruptive attendees.

Name: Corporate Performance Mgmt (CPM)
Description: The HTI Group has chosen the software BOARD to support its Accounting & Controlling departments in the area of Corporate Performance Management (CPM). The Accounting departments are using BOARD in the Financial Consolidation Process, whereas the Controlling departments are using it in the Profit & Loss Planning Process. The Financial Consolidation Application works with actual figures and generates the HTI Group Consolidated Financial Statements (Balance Sheet and Profit & Loss) starting from the Local Financial Statements of each Company. The Profit & Loss Planning Application works with budget & forecast figures (featuring the “data entry” functionality) and allows creating an HTI Consolidated Profit & Loss with both a legal and a business view.

Name: Piteco
Description: Piteco is a treasury management system. It is used for all activities related to cash management, such as: payments, currency settlements, credit lines management, comparison of bank conditions, management of financial products (financings, bank guarantees, risk management, loans & leasings and others). Piteco serves also for posting all bank movements to SAP - ERP system. The third main functionality is the reporting module, it is used for the financial planning, financial reporting and bank transactions analysis.

Name: Reflex
Description: The Reflex Software is used by the accounting department and offers a full range of financial functions, including general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, budgeting, bank reconciliation, asset management, and purchasing capabilities.

Name: Optimmo
Description: OPTIMMO was used for asset management by the french companies, which were outside of SAP. With the migration to SAP, the asset management is done directly in SAP.

Name: Viareport Conso&Report
Description: Consolidation and reporting solutions in the cloud Conso & Report follow each step in the consolidation process: Interface with upstream accounting systems, automatic data collection and controls, posting of consolidation entries, generation of consolidated financial statements and auditing of consolidation operations.

Name: Concur
Description: SAP Concur is used to request any field services and business trips. Each employee has to request the authorization adding, if necessary, several travel services (hotel/flight/ferry/train/parking/rental car/transfer/visa/meeting room…) SAP Conur is also used by the employees to process the expenses by scanning the receipts and invoices (phone app). The approval managers approve the travel and expense requests. The travel department prepares the travel requests by booking the travel services if needed and paying them. The travel department furthermore processes also the expense requests lending to the Travel Policy and submits them to the accounting department for refund. The accounting department registers the receipts and invoices in SAP and keeps the accounting balance of each employee.

Name: SuccessFactors
Description: With SuccessFactors trainings can be managed, such as registrations to internally organized courses, requests for external courses or similar as well as the yearly performance interviews. Beyond that the program allows to display and/or export the personnel structure and personnel data

Name: Atoss Access Management
Description: With ATOSS Access Management individual access rights can be assigned for each employee, if required temporally. With the employee ID card, authorised areas and doors can then be opened.

Name: Atoss Time Management
Description: Atoss Time Management is used for recording employees' working times by using a time stamp clock. Via a Web-client employee can access their personal time recording overview, submit vacation requests and request corrections for incorrect bookings on the intranet portal. The supervisor can release or reject employee requests

Name: ExpensePoint
Description: With the Travel and Expense Management Tool Expensepoint, travel requests and expense claims were processed. This tool has been replaced by Concur

Name: Notilus
Description: Notilus is a Travel and Expense Management Tool. Employees can use the tool to submit their expense reports and apply for business trips in accordance the company's travel policy and request approval from the travel department.

Name: ADP HR Resource Partner
Description: HK-2021-04-22: The Application itself is not in use any more, but we need to keep the Server for historical data.

Name: ADP Pay Specialist
Description: HK-2021-04-22: The Application itself is not in use any more, but we need to keep the Server for historical data.

Name: ADP Gestion des Temps et Activités (GTA)
ServiceID Name: APP-03-10 ADP Gestion des Temps et Activités (GTA)
Description: ADP GTA is used for the tracking of the working hours and the management of time-off requests. As it is a submodule of ADP Decidum, it has been merged into ADP Decidium.

Name: ADP Kiosque RH
Description: ADP Kiosque RH is used for the Performance Management and is a submodule of ADP Decidum, so it has been merged into ADP Decidium

Name: ADP Vision
Description: ADP Vision is a submodule of ADP Decidum, so it has been merged into ADP Decidium

Name: Chubb Director
Description: Chubb AFX Director is an access control system.  It is used to provide the employees access to the building of PRINOTH Granby through HID access cards and proximity readers. Access authorizations for different areas can be assigned for each employee individually.

Name: Consens Time recording
Description: https://www.consens.co.at/

Name: Sage payroll and payment software
ServiceID Name: APP-03-17 Sage payroll and payment software

Name: Syracuse Access Management
Description: With Syracuse access control software, individual access rights can be assigned to each employee. The employee ID card identifies the employee and gives him or her access.

Name: Talentry
Description: True to the motto “employees know other good employees”, employee referrals are one of the most important recruitment tools for a company. With Talentry the employees can share vacancies through their social networks to find new suitable staff for our Italian and Austrian sites. Employees can track the progress of the referral through to possible hiring and receive a bonus payment if the referral is successful.

Name: Ceridian payroll system
ApplicationCategory: Human capital management (HCM);#8;#Payroll Software;#9;#Time Mgmt. Software;#6
Description: Ceridian DayForce Payroll is the solution used by PRINOTH NA for it’s payroll management. It is also used for the employees timesheets, vacation demands and approvals, emergency contact information and additionally it’s used for our talent management (yearly performance evaluation). It also controls the various bells schedule for the shop employee breaks.

Name: Timetracker
Description: Timetracker is an in-house developed software of LPOA for the presence control by stamping and for the requestion of vacation. The tool has an interface to SAP and BI.

Name: Access It!
Description: Accessit is an access control system. Each employee has a FOB, which is used as a digital key. Access authorisations can be given or revoked individually for each employee via a web interface. The application itself runs on a server.

Name: Keso Access Management
Description: Keso Access Management consists of classic locking cylinders and a software to create keys for one or more locking cylinders. With this software, access authorizations for employees are managed. As the locking cylinders do not contain any electronic components, single keys cannot be blocked. Therefore it is planned to replace the software.

Name: ADP Decidium
ApplicationCategory: Human capital management (HCM);#8;#Payroll Software;#9;#Time Mgmt. Software;#6
Description: ADP Decidium has several functions. One tool is the time management to record the hours worked and to manage the time-off requests. Furthermore, the software offers a payroll tool which uses the attendance data from the time management tool. With the Perfomange Management Toll, individual-, team- or organizationgoals can be defined. There is also a tool for organizational management and for learning and trainings.

Name: Software for On- and Offboarding
ServiceID Name: APP-03-25 Software for On- and Offboarding

Name: Customer Relationship Mgmt (CRM)
Description: IT-Smart Business Client is the Customer Relation Management (CRM) System of PRINOTH Snowgrooming and Utility Vehicle division. Prinoth is tracking all kind of leads for vehicle sales and the most important sales activities with customers in example visits and vehicle - demonstrations. The goal is to have the best possible overview of the market in order to be able to provide an accurate sales forecast for other departments of the company.

Name: LEEGOO Builder
Description: system software for sales manager and sales engineers. It is used to build the ropeway configuration for commercial material / service in a goods effort. All sales managers can use it as a unitary system for the whole offer and price process. Internal it is used as an interface to a lot of other operational departments and external for a basic communication with the customer. Leegoo serves also by a customer order/ installation as a internal checklist for kick-off-meeting and project budgeting for all involved operational departments.

Name: Mapro
Description: MaPro is an online configuration tool for snow guns, lances, mobile pumps, wheatear stations and SnowVisual. A Mapro configuration is needed for every sale that includes one of this products. In addition to all the specifics of the product, the salesman has to insert all the information regarding the customer (deliver and billing address) and information of the order (quantity, delivery date, purpose (purchase/rental/demo)). Further than avoid incompatible configurations and ensure that all the needed information are provided, Mapro is used as interface between the sales and production department (avoiding mails).

Name: Haddex customer sanction list
Description: Haddex customer sanctions list is provided by the German Federal Office of Economics and Export Control to check if business partners are affected by a state sanction of the EU, USA or Japan and therefore business transactions are not allowed.

Name: p&p MultiTouch App for product present.
ServiceID Name: APP-04-06 p&p MultiTouch App for product present.

Name: Mailchimp email marketing software
Description: Mailchimp is a marketing automation platform and an email marketing service. With Mailchimp you can compose your newsletter campaigns online, from templates or through the online editor. Furthermore, you can measure the performance and results of your emailing campaigns in detail (opening rate, inactive addresses, click rate) but also compare them to your previous performance.

Name: Rebus render farm service
Description: Render Farm Service specialized in rendering 3D projects. The purpose of a render farm is to run render jobs significantly easier and faster by distributing the render over hundreds and thousands of servers.

Name: Mobile Service (App)
Description: The Leitner Mobile Service is a solution for field technicians to work on service orders. Material, work and the related documentation are sent from the SAP – ERP system to the Mobile Service solution and back into the SAP – ERP system allowing for a paperless process.

Name: Calem
Description: CalemEAM is a Computarized Maintenance Management System useful to coordinate and optimize all technical activities and logistic means needed for Maintenance Activities. It is used to plan, monitor, track, analyze, and archive the history of maintenance operations (preventive and corrective works). CalemEAM allows also to manage the stock levels. This product is a daily tool for the maintenance crews who consult the maintenance to be done on the system. It is used by O&M managers on site to organize and improve the maintenance activities but also to analyse the maintenance costs.

Name: CSM - Warranty Tool
Description: The warranty tool is a web-based solution for selected Prinoth Service Partners to submit warranty claims directly into the SAP-ERP system. The tool allows handling of the warranty claim and its related communication either from within or through SAP – ERP system. Given that a SAP account is needed, authorization for this tool has to be carefully evaluated.

Name: Optimiza
Description: Optimiza supply chain planning software is used to maximize service levels and increase customer loyalty. They do this by aligning demand and supply processes and building, managing and executing a dynamic, agile and responsive demand and replenishment plan. Optimiza is used Spare Part forecasting and planning. The Software has an interface to SAP with a daily update.

Name: Webshop Prinoth (Catalog Creator)
Description: Prinoth Parts-Shop is an online catalogue for a majority of Prinoth’s spare parts. Customers generally use the tool to get immediate information and generate a first quote. This platform currently shows 83 catalogues. Each catalogue belongs to a certain snow groomer and contains its specific spare parts, so the customer can make profit on an online one-stop-shop solution. For quick and easy handling, exploded drawings are integrated.

Name: JMP
Description: JMP is a data analysis software. Data can be imported into the program from common file formats, cleaned up and analyzed by histograms, regression, distribution adjustment and other analysis functions. The results can be graphically displayed with various dynamic diagrams. Leitwind is mainly using it for performing statistical and correlation analyses on large sets of turbine data.

Name: Webshop Demaclenko (Component Engine)
Description: The Demaclenko E-CAT is an online-catalogue primary for spare-parts of the snow-generators (lances and fan guns) but also for several accessories. It is a part-finding-tool, mainly based on exploded drawings of the products, which includes a function to create orders or quotes directly in the catalogue. The customer support receives the orders and proceeds them immediately. E-CAT is currently available in 4 languages: English, German, Italian, French

Name: CoPilot
Description: Copilot is a web app which provides ropeway operators with the right information for operation and maintenance on POMA’s ropeways, such as technical documentations, manuals, drawings, Etc..

Name: Webshop
Business Representatives: BERTOLAMI Olivier;#144;#HINZMANN Andre;#158;#ROECK Alexander;#224;#FAUCHE Michael;#115;#LEGENDRE Franck;#225;#HAFNER Stephan;#104
Description: The Webshop is a Web-based solution for our customers to list, search and order spare parts. The Price for the spare parts is shown online, so no price quotation has to be done. Spare parts orders placed in the webshop will be directly stored and confirmed in SAP and can be forwarded immediately to the picking, packing and shipping department. In the customer account, the customers have a complete overview on his order history, from the quotation until the invoices.

Name: Topflow Production Data C. (PDC)
Description: Topflow Production Data Capturing (PDC) is the tool to confirm production order steps. It is used for Time and quantity bookings on orders and to give the overview of an actual situation in the production (Produced parts, Scrap, Time Needed). The tool also books the Time and parts, that a worker needed to produce the part on the operation.

Name: Tesi Transport Mgmt System (TMS)
Description: TESI TMS transport management system enables a door-to-door transport solution covering all needs in terms of transport type, transport mode and network providing control on transportation process, starting from a request for transportation until to the freight invoice control, for all types of shipments

Name: Tesi Supply Chain Management (SCM)
Description: Tesi Supply Chain Management enables a collaborative process with suppliers to plan, manage, and control better the goods and services flows across all supply chain execution phases, from the order fulfilment to warehousing.

Name: Atoss Staff Planning
Description: This software is intended for shift management in SAP/TOPFLOW.  Via an interface to our reporting system in Topflow, associated shifts to the employee, are maintained by the responsible Production planner/foreman in ATOSS Staff Planning and then transferred to SAP - Top flow.  By this transfer the automatic break confirmation for the worker, assigned to his shift, is guaranteed and has no more done manually.

Name: Kronos Workforce
Description: Kronos Workforce Management can be used for time recording, personnel resource planning, absence management, task management and workforce analytics.

Name: NX CAM
Description: Computer Aided Manufacturing (CAM) is a numerical control (NC) programming tool to create NC codes for CNC-machines, which use tree-dimensional (3-D) models of components generated in CAD.  CAM systems allows creating the NC code offline and simulating the result before starting production in order to guarantee high quality. The CAM system allows create advanced 5-axis machining programs to produce complex parts with fewer operations and setups – reducing cost and delivery times. CAM is using interfaces with CNC-machines, TC (Siemens NX) and TMS system (Tool Management System).

Name: Asix
Description: AsiX is the software to manage environmental and safety requirements. AsiX gives an overview about tasks, maintenance schedule, always-actual legal compliance and employee qualifications and necessary renewing of the trainings of the employees.

Name: Paratox
Description: Maerix Paratox is our Regulatory Compliance management software. It contains all relevant information regarding the hazardous materials such as dangerous ingredients, safety tips, storage and use information. It can also print safety labels and is accessible by all employees as a reference in case of any emergencies related to hazardous materials.

Name: Fire alarm system software
Description: The software is used to control the fire alarm system at the Leitner production site in Unterackern. Therefore, it connects to the fire alarm control centre. This allows to check the current status of the entire system, to check the individual fire smoke detectors or to deactivate them if necessary e.g. for construction works.

Name: IMC Studio
Description: IMC offers compact instruments for measuring various parameters, which are connected to the IMC Studio software via LAN or network connection. The software can be used to control the instrument, to read and analyze the data and to export them. This allows, for example, to carry out certifications and load measurements and to analyse the power curve in order to increase efficiency.

Name: Catman
Description: Catman is a measurement software from the company HBM. The software is used for visualization, storage and data analysis for HBM amplifiers.  With the software, the data can be visualized, analyzed and stored during measurement and subsequent reporting.

Name: Logging Software Bruel&Kjaer
Description: Brüel & Kjaer Measurement Partner Suite BZ-5003 is used for post-processing noise and vibration data. In its basic configuration, Measurement Partner Suit offers an extended display and maintenance platform for Brüel & Kjaer handheld analyzers as standard PC software.

Name: Supplier Kanban Maurin
Description: This software triggers an automatic purchase orders when low stock of screwing parts stocks

Name: Production Concept SIGMA
Description: This WBS was created for a paperless manufacturing project at Sigma Composite, but this project never has been realised.

Name: Kardex
Description: Kardex is an automatic high-bay warehouse system, for the storage of parts of different sizes, with one ore more openings. With its own software (PPG), a part can be requested from the storage system or new parts can be stored. In addition, Kardex is connected to SAP and exchanges information on the movement of goods via it.

Name: ecoRegS
Description: EcoReg S is a software for waste management which is used by the HSE team. The software digitally maps the waste register, automatically generates any waste recognition certificates and sends the annual MUD waste report to the Chamber of Commerce automatically. The authorizations of the disposers and transporters are also checked and statistics are generated.

Name: ExpoVit e-dec Import
ApplicationCategory: Transport Mgmt. System (TMS);#75;#Export control Mgmt.;#46;#Customs Declaration Programm (CDP);#36
Description: E-dec is a system of the Swiss Customs Administration to simplify and streamline their processes. A cornerstone of customs procedures is the replacement of forms with electronic solutions. The system e-dec was developed for this purpose. With e-dec, the imports and exports are processed and the associated customs documents (eVV) created electronically. ExpoVit e-dec is the associated software solution that allows these documents to be securely managed and shared between partners.

Name: Zoller Tool Management solutions
Description: Zoller Tool Management Solutions is a system to analyze, prepare and manage Tools for machines.  One component is the preparation of the tools for the machines, another component is the managing of the milling cutters in a warehouse management system.  Before the system starts, the machine checks with a measurement system the right assembling of the milling cutters. Additionally, the software has an interface to NX for a better organization of the needed tools for the next production order.

Name: Topflow Machine data collection (MDC)
Description: Topflow Machine data collection (MDC) is an interface between SAP and the machines. Over a programmed list of the ongoing production order, the worker on the machine can select the next order and send the needed information’s (Confirmation number, needed parts, program number,…) to the machine. After close of a production step, the machine sends the information’s (Produced Quantity, Confirmation number,…) back to ERP.  Then operator needs to confirm the same manualy in TOPMES (Confirmation mask from Topflow) to close the production step.

Name: Atlas Copco Work Vision
External Service Providers/Suppliers: Atlas Copco Tools Central Europe GmbH;#120
Description: Atlas Copco Work Vision is an employee assisting software which is used in the chair production in Telfs. Beforehand, individual work steps must be programmed in the system. Inside the production the steps are processed one after the other by the employee, and the software provides the employee with all the necessary information. In the background, the system stores which employee carried out which work step on which chair.

Name: ATLAS Customs declaration programme
Description: With ATLAS we can make an export declaration to export our goods. We have all the master data that is custom relevant saved in the program and can reuse old transactions, transcribe them and use time to make a similar export declaration for the same customer again.

Name: IPO.Log
Description: With IPO.log the production, assembly and logistics can be tested before being implemented in a real environment. The IPO.Log software creates a virtual factory using information, such as CAD-data, work processes, logistics processes, material lists as well as worker and product data.  Many challences of assembly planning, such as material flow planning, line balancing, worker planning, variant planning, etc. can be planned and optimized quickly and reliably with IPO.Log.

Name: Hexagon Polyworks
Description: With Polyworks, a manufactured part can be optically analyzed by using a point cloud and a laser tracker to determine deviations from the manufactured part compared to the engineering plan. This data is then output in a 3D control report.

Name: Fiori-App for Barcode scanning
Description: The Fiori applications are web-based application created with an SAP framework, to access SAP data. Within the HTI Group the Fiori application has been developed for mobile devices that will be able to manage the warehouse and the shipping activities. With Fiori it is possible to move stock inside the warehouse, check what is in a storage bin or where is a material, also process inventories count recording. The picking and the packing process are also digitalized with, for the packing process the possibility to take pictures with the application and record them directly into SAP.

Name: Per Angusta Procurement Management
Description: Identify : Identify all possible opportunities to reduce spend, cut risk, and boost vendor quality. Complete visibility means no sourcing opportunity slips through the cracks. Prioritize : In your Sourcing Pipeline, prioritize sourcing projects based on criteria such as value and risk. Effortlessly reshuffle priorities as necessary. Forecast : Produce a reliable savings forecast for each sourcing project. Build realistic and shared objectives. Enjoy a trusted figure for the total contracted savings your team is committing to delivering in the future. Collaborate : Complete transparency in the Sourcing Pipeline facilitates collaboration within the Procurement team and with Finance and other stakeholders. Measure : Measure progress in meeting your procurement goals. Be alerted to events and bottlenecks that threaten your performance. Communicate : Armed with trusted reports, share your progress with Finance and business stakeholders. Reshuffle your priorities to best meet their urgent needs.

Name: Modula WMS
Description: In communication with Zoller TMS to prepare Tools for the machines in the production. Modula is a vertical storage managed by the Software modula WMS. Modula vendor

Name: AlmaCam Cut
Description: The Almacam Cut CAD/CAM Cutting software controls all brands of cutting machines with maximum consideration of each technology at all stages of programming, from part preparation to NC code generation, nesting and tool paths.

Name: Minitab
Description:
Minitab, originally intended as a tool for teaching statistics, is a general-purpose statistical software package designed for easy interactive use. Minitab is well suited for instructional applications, but is also powerful enough to be used as a primary tool for analyzing research data.
Since it was created in 1972, Minitab has become the leading statistical software for quality improvement. It is used in every industry that uses data analysis and statistics to make their products and processes better.
 
Leitner Quality Department is using Minitab to implement Lean Six Sigma.

Name: Trumpf TruTops
Description: Trumpf TruTops is used in the workshop  for the programming of machining plans for machine tools (cutting aluminium sheet, steel, stainless steel).

Name: Fiori Dashboard for Logistics
Description: Dashboards for Logistics activities  Display the SAP data to process logistics activities  Warehouse Management Transfer Order Cockpit : to manage the WM queues, the TO queues and the users.  Delivery Cockpit : to display the realization status of the picking and packing on deliveries within the day and drill down to each issues that compromise the shipment date and time.  Production Cockpit : to display the realization status of the production staging within the day and drill down to each issues that compromise the full staging.  Delivery Cockpit and Production Cockpit are expected to be also display on workshop big screens.

Name: Manufacturing Execution System Prinoth
Description: Systems used in manufacturing to track and document the transformation of raw materials to finished goods. MES provides information that helps manufacturing decision makers understand how current conditions on the plant floor can be optimized to improve production output.[1] MES works in real time to enable the control of multiple elements of the production process (e.g. inputs, personnel, machines and support services).

Name: Comara sysCut
Description: Comara sysCut PES (Process Executing System) facilitates the automatic acquisition and structuring of process data from machining. With direct access to CNC controls that supply data, a comprehensive amount of information - ranging from an enterprise-wide perspective on an abstract level to detailed views of individual machines and tools - is tapped and made available to the right place in the company. This improves transparency, control and cooperation within the company along the entire value chain.

Name: Teamcenter & T4S
Description: Teamcenter is a product lifecycle management (PLM) system that connects people and processes, across functional silos, with a digital thread for innovation. With Teamcenter you can solve more of the tough challenges required to develop highly successful products. The Teamcenter Gateway for SAP (T4S) enables a real-time synchronization of Documents, Materials, Bill of materials and Processes between Teamcenter and SAP.

Name: Across
Description: The Across Language Server is our translation management system for enterprises and language service providers. It supports the entire translation process from the project and workflow control to the translation, correction, and release.  In our group, Across is used in the translation process management to reduce tranlsation costs and improve quality. It also used to provide groupwide terminology or carry-on Machine translations via DeepL plugin.

Name: Cortona 3D
Description: Cortona3D RapidAuthor for Teamcenter is an integrated solution that overcomes this isolation and enables technical authors to work in the PLM environment and interact directly with engineering design geometry and bills of material (BOM) and rapidly create 2D/3D interactive parts catalogs, maintenance manuals, training materials, work instructions that reflect accurate product description. The tools included in the suite enable organizations to reuse existing CAD data or other 3D source material, to author interactive 3D visualizations for more effective support documentation, dramatically reducing effort and timelines.  Its intuitive interface enables users with no 3D expertise to create compelling simulations and associated text simultaneously.

Name: NX
Description: Siemens NX 3D CAD software is a flexible and powerful integrated solution that helps you deliver better products faster and more efficiently. Delivering the next generation of design, simulation, and manufacturing solutions that enable companies to realize the value of the digital twin. NX is supporting every aspect of product development, from concept design through engineering and manufacturing, giving you an integrated toolset that coordinates disciplines, preserves data integrity and design intent, and streamlines the entire process.

Name: Catia
ApplicationCategory: Computer Aided design 3D (3D CAD);#25;#Computer Aided design 2D (2D CAD);#24
Description: Catia is a 3D and 2D CAT software for the design and drawing of parts and assemblies, as well as for the creation of drawing derivations.  At Prinoth it is used for the custruction of snow groomers and tracked vehicles. Catia also has a interface to Teamcenter

Name: Dlubal RFEM
Description: The structural analysis software RFEM is used for fast and easy modelling, static and dynamic calculation and design of 2D or 3D models with beam, plate, disk, folding, shell, volume or contact elements.

Name: Matlab
Description: Matlab is a calculation software which is used for numerical simulation as well as data acquisition, data analysis and evaluation. The primary feature of the software is the calculation with the help of matrices.

Name: Bladed
Description: Bladed is an integrated software package, used for the specification and dynamic simulation of all wind turbine parameters (e.g. Aerodynamic and structural properties), for the specification of environmental inputs and load cases (e.g. Wind fields, Turbine faults, Earthquakes) and for the specification of the Electrical network and any disturbances that may occur. The results can be presented graphically.

Name: Catalog Creator
Description: Catalog Creator is a digital i.e. electronic parts catalog creation tool. By using BOM parts lists and related images, it creates parts books for various output formats such as print PDF, as well as digital interactive HTML parts books that can be made accessible online i.e. integrated in online shops and portals.

Name: Windographer
Description: Windographer is the industry leading software for the analysis of wind resource data measured by met tower, SoDAR, and LiDAR. It quickly imports virtually every data format, allows rapid quality control and statistical analyses including MCP and but also the calculation of quantities such as air density and turbulence intensity., and exports to all common wind flow models.

Name: SierraSoft ProSt
Description: SierraSoft is a software for surveying, modelling and analysing the terrain structure. It can read in data via GPS, laser scanning, drones and other sources. From this, a detailed 3D model of the terrain can be generated, on which satellite images can be placed.

Name: FE-UX Weldfat
Description: The evaluation program FE-UX Weldfat uses the (shell) element stresses of the shell elements to assess the admissibility of the welds. Every weld is associated with a component and receives the appropriate notch classification for stresses longitudinal and transverse to the weld according to DIN15018, EC3 or EN13001 for this component. For the evaluation of a weld on a component element groups respectively common averaged element groups on this component are used.

Name: Meteodyn WT
Description: Whether on simple or complex terrain including forests, mountains, lakes, etc., Meteodyn WT accurately assesses the wind characteristics and the wind resource. This software is dedicated to the wind power industry and integrates the indispensable IEC standards. The software uses computational fluid dynamics (CFD) to model the wind at a specific location in order to plan the position of the wind turbines

Name: Spatial Manager for AutoCAD
Description: Spatial Manager for AutoCAD is used to determine exact geocoordinates and to create a visual orthophoto. The tool is used in conjunction with SnowVisual to find shafts for the snow guns and place them virtually in the landscape, to plan the pipeline system, etc.

Name: NX Nastran / Simcenter
Description: Simcenter Amesim is a simulation software consisting of different tools to model, analyze and predict the performance of mechatronics systems, especially in terms of their hydraulic, pneumatic, thermal, electric or mechanical behavior. In Contrast to CAE-Software Amesin does not need exact CAD-Data in Order to analyses the model.

Name: Virtual Lab Desktop
Description: LMS Virtual.Lab software features an integrated computer-aided engineering (CAE) suite for accurate simulation and optimization of mechanical system performance for structural integrity, noise and vibration, system dynamics and durability. It is used for the calculation of wind turbines.

Name: Safeexpert Compact
Description: Safexpert is special software for CE marking and risk assessment in accordance with the Machinery Directive and the Low Voltage Directive, which provides companies a significant support in dealing with standards and EU directives.

Name: DIgSILENT PowerFactory
Description: PowerFactory is a leading power system analysis software application for use in analysing generation, transmission, distribution and industrial systems. It covers the full range of functionality from standard features to highly sophisticated and advanced applications including windpower, distributed generation, real-time simulation and performance monitoring for system testing and supervision. At Leitwind the software is used for the simulation of the wind turbine behavior.

Name: Cinema 4D
Description: Cinema 4D is a 3D graphics software for the creation of 3D models, textures, computer graphics and animations. The program is used to provide external offices with 3D models and to import 3D models from external offices. In addition, it can be used to create plant and product specific renderings (e.g. graphics from raw data like sketches...) or animations. Modeling through natural phenomena such as texture, refraction, reflection, shadows, etc. gives the viewer an impression of materiality, size and form.

Name: Mathcad
Description: PTC Mathcad is a Engineering Math Software, that allows to present and save your calculations with plots, graphs, text, and images in a single document

Name: Franson CoordTrans
Description: CoordTrans is used to converts geographic coordinates between different coordinate systems worldwide.

Name: Femap
Description: Femap (Finite Element Modeling And Postprocessing) is an advanced simulation application for creating, editing and importing/re-using mesh-centric finite element analysis models of complex products or systems. Femap is used to model components, assemblies or systems and provides also powerful data-driven and graphical results visualization and evaluation.  It is possible to combine Femap with a wide variety of CAD systems and finite element analysis solvers, including NX Nastran application, to deliver a comprehensive computer-aided engineering analysis solution.

Name: GE Fanuc CIMPLICITY
Description: GE Fanuc CIMPLIVITY is the software we use to control our dynamometer to test our vehicles at the end of their production cycle. This software has heavy programming which interconnects various sensors connected to different equipment of the dynamometer and of the vehicles through a PLC.  This creates a dashboard when the operator can see various values and perform stress tests on the vehicles before delivery. At the end, a report is created with the results of the test and given to the customer.

Name: SketchUp Pro
Description: SketchUp is a basic 3D drawing program and is used by Leitner for the presentation of ropeways. The ropeway is drawn in the program from simplified objects including the station buildings. The ropeway is exported to Google Earth, where it is digitally placed in the landscape. Using a screen recorder, film footage of the ropeway is then taken to present the ropeway to the customer.

Name: Arbortext IsoDraw
Description: Arbotext IsoDraw CAD is a software used for the design of spare parts catalogs for alpine and utility vehicles produced by Prinoth. They are the technical redactor of the department of technical publications that they use it. This software can operate 3D files from STEP FILES, then convert them to 2D (JPEG, SVG) files. It is simple to use and stable.

Name: Solidworks
ApplicationCategory: Computer aided engineering (CAE);#26;#Computer Aided design 3D (3D CAD);#25
Description: Solidworks is a 3D CAT software for the design and drawing of parts and assemblies, as well as for the creation of drawing derivations.

Name: Autodesk Autocad Mechanical
Description: Mechanical is an extension of AutoCAD for the mechanical engineering sector (CAD / CAM). It is a 2D application with a significantly expanded range of commands, standard parts, and calculation and BOM functions. Our users also use the integration of AutoCAD with Team center to load the information from Team center. Another customization we have is the plot function, which is used to plot the drawing on a paper or to convert the drawing to other file formats, like pdf.

Name: Robot Structural Analysis Prof.
Description: Robot Structural is a software for Structural Analysis, that tests the effects of structural loads, verify code compliance and use BIM-integrated workflows to exchange data with Revit.

Name: Plexearth
Description: With Plexarth, AutoCAD drawings can be exported to Google Earth and digitally presented at their intended location with Google Earth.

Name: Minesoft PatBase
Description: Minesoft is an online patent search tool, which allows to search and filter for patents. The tool also keeps you up-to-date with newly published international patents. Furthermore you can Monitor new patent citations and gain actionable competitive intelligence using CiteTracker and monitor change to the legal status of any patent publication using Legal StatusTracker.

Name: Kubotek KeyCreator
ApplicationCategory: Computer Aided design 3D (3D CAD);#25;#Computer Aided design 2D (2D CAD);#24
Description: Kubotek KeyCreator is a 2D/3D CAD modeling software.  KeyCreator is utilized by the engineering department to create and modify both 2D and 3D drawings and models.  These drawings and models are used for fabrication, assembly, construction, and illustrations for various documents.  KeyCreator has the ability to export and import various file types; allowing users to receive and send files to users on different CAD platforms.  KeyCreator is a “Direct” 2D/3D CAD modeling software; this feature is unique in that the software is non-parametric and non-history based.  Native file format is .ckd

Name: Autodesk Simulation Mechanical
Description: Autodesk Simulation Mechanical is a finite element analysis (FEA) software program.  Autodesk Simulation Mechanical is utilized by the engineering department to analyze individual parts and assemblies’ reaction to loads in a variety of different scenarios.  The output results can show deflection, stress, strain, and a large number of other outputs.  These testing scenarios include both static and dynamic simulations.  From the software results, the engineering department is able to reduce the need for physical prototypes and are able to optimize designs with less iterations.

Name: RISA-3D
Description: Risa-3D is a software program used for analyzing structures of various component types.  Risa-3D is utilized by the engineering department to analyze structural assemblies’ reaction to loads in a variety of different loading scenarios.  The program consists of an easy to use interface that allows users to quickly change the loading configuration.  The output results show deflection, stress, strain, and also compliance with a variety of governing code requirements.  From the software results, the engineering department is able to reduce the need for physical prototypes and are able to optimize designs with less iterations.

Name: Google Earth Pro
Description: Google Earth is a computer program that renders a 3D representation of Earth based primarily on satellite imagery. The program maps the Earth by superimposing satellite images, aerial photography, and GIS data onto a 3D globe, allowing users to see and explore cities and landscapes from various angles.

Name: Rhino
Description: Rhinoceros is a computer-aided design (CAD) application and it is primarily a free form surface modeler that utilizes the NURBS mathematical mode. Rhinoceros is used in computer-aided manufacturing (CAM), rapid prototyping, 3D printing and reverse engineering in industries including architecture, industrial and product design. Furthermore, it supports over 30 CAD file formats for importing and exporting. it is used for the planning of snowparks.

Name: KISSsoft
Description: KISSsoft is a calculation software for mechanical engineering integrated into our 3-CAD programs. The software is used for sizing, optimizing and recalculating designs for machine components such as gears, shafts, bearings, connecting elements, springs as well as chains and belts. Additional modules such as conversion between different hardness systems, tolerance calculations complete KISSsoft.

Name: Schema CMS
Key Users: WEBER Pierre;#232;#PRAMSTRALLER Werner;#183;#HOLZMANN Daniel;#234;#PLAICKNER Simon;#195;#SCHOELZHORN Guenther;#235
Description: A ready-to-use authoring system, all features for professional technical authoring are included in the standard version of the software: XML, and other standards, translation, version, variant and product information management (PIM), link management, warnings, workflows, integrated editors like MS Word, extensive search functionality, simultaneous publication in various media (print / internet / CD-ROM / online help / tablet). Flexible management of existing data allows the system to be up and running in the shortest possible time.  In our Group, this application is used in Technical Documentation because it offers reuse capabilities, it is also used to provide  HTML help for software like SCADA systems.

Name: APIS IQ FMEA
Description: Among the most important aspects of any analysis is how data and information are captured and represented. The APIS IQ-Software uses model-based, graphical tools and methods; greatly simplifying and enhancing the software ease-of-use and minimizing your chances for missing important areas of risk. You will be able to confidently and clearly communicate your analysis results to others.  In our Group, this software will be used to perform FMEA analysis and documents.

Name: Autodesk AEC collection
Description: REVIT :   Software to produce complete, consistent and coordinated, model-based projects and documents. Revit includes tools for professionals in architectural design, MEP and structural, detail definition, engineering and construction. CIVIL 3D:  Software to civil engineering design software supports Building Information Modeling (BIM) with integrated functionality to optimize construction design, planning and documentation. The functionality of Civil 3D supports a wide range of civil infrastructure projects, including roads and motorways, railways, airports, urbanization of the territory, civil structures and water, sewerage and drainage networks. 3D MAX : Software that with most major renderers to create high-end scenes and stunning visuals for design visualisation and more. Experience interactive rendering from the interface for accurate and detailed previews while you work.

Name: OROS NVGate Spectrum Analyzer
Description:
NVGate is the OROS software platform. It manages instruments’ setup and signal analysis in both real-time and post-processing. NVGate is the link between data acquisition and analysis results. It gathers the basis of noise & vibration measurement backbone with front-end setup, signal processing, calibrations, transducers’ database, live results graphs, reports and measurement automation tools. It holds natively the Teamwork software technology that boost efficiency, security and quality of measurements.
 
Modal analysis is a powerful technique for understanding structures behavior to validate simulation results, mechanical designs and maintenance. This application oriented software associates the latest algorithms with a user friendly interface and automatic procedures.

Name: Siemens Plant Simulation
Description: Plant Simulation is a computer application developed by Siemens PLM Software for modeling, simulating, analyzing, visualizing and optimizing production systems and processes, the flow of materials and logistic operations. Using Tecnomatix Plant Simulation, users can optimize material flow, resource utilization and logistics for all levels of plant planning from global production facilities, through local plants, to specific lines. Within the Plant Design und Optimization Solution the software portfolio, to which Plant Simulation belongs, is — together with the products of the Digital Factory and of Digital Manufacturing — part of the Product Lifecycle Management Software (PLM). The application allows comparing complex production alternatives, including the immanent process logic, by means of computer simulations. Plant Simulation is used by individual production planners as well as by multi-national enterprises, primarily to strategically plan layout, control logic and dimensions of large, complex production investments

Name: Meteodyn Urbawind
Description: UrbaWind is a wind flow modeling software especially developed for urban areas and green building. The Pedestrian wind comfort module is dedicated to architects, urban planners, sustainable and environmental engineers. It determines areas of possible wind discomfort to make safe and comfortable urban environments around buildings.

Name: Autodesk BIM 360
Description: BIM 360 is a unified platform connecting your project teams and data in real-time, from design through construction, supporting informed decision-making and leading to more predictable and profitable outcomes.

Name: Moment of Inspiration 3D
Description: MoI’s sleek intuitive UI blends a fluid easy workflow with powerful tools, making it the perfect choice for someone who has been frustrated with the complexity of existing CAD tools.  MoI is also a fantastic complementary tool for a polygon-based artist since its CAD toolset and advanced boolean functions enable extremely rapid creation of mechanical or man-made type “hard surface” models. The icing on the cake is MoI’s unique polygon mesh export that generates exceptionally clean and crisp N-Gon polygon meshes from CAD NURBS models.

Name: See / IGE XAO
Description: See electrical is a CAE program for the planning of switch cabinets as well as the electrical wiring, which can represent the current flow and can also create Bills of material and documentation (electrical drawings, cabinet Layout, cable list, I/O List, Terminal List, Material List) which are used for manufacturing (workshop) and maintenance on site. The Data can be exported  for Software engineers and for for manufacturing (workshop)

Name: TIA Portal / Step 7
Description: TIA, Totally Integrated Automation Portal, is the engineering framework for automation tasks. SIMATIC STEP7 is the software for configuration, programming, testing and diagnosis of all SIMATIC controllers. Essential in Leitner ropeways installations is safety and modularity of control system. The full innovative Leitner Drive Control system is engeneered by TIA. TIA results easy to learn and use, efficient thanks to integration and reusability, proven due to the scalability. Additional is the flexibility to work on single module and then integrate it to achieve a safe and robust plan. From designing, commissioning, operating and maintaining to upgrading, TIA saves time, cost, and effort.

Name: Opera Software
Description: The Opera Simulation Software Suite is a Finite Element Analysis (FEA) software package proven to provide accurate electromagnetic field modelling for all types of machines, including axial flux topologies and linear motion devices. Electromagnetic and other physics solvers, that provide different levels of analysis complexity, are available. Comprehensive material modelling options (including magnetization, demagnetization in service and full vector hysteresis material model) as well as easy definition of external drive circuits are all geared towards facilitating machines design. In Leitner we are using the electromagnetic and thermal solver tools.

Name: Altium Designer
Description: Altium Designer is an electronic design automation software package with a subscription model and floating licenses for printed circuit boards with an advanced routing technology and a very high number of ready to use components. It includes a complete, design environment for electronic printed circuit board design. Altium designer offers mixed signal simulation of electrical circuits and components from the schematics used for the PCB design. It supports the PSpice and SIMCode model formats.

Name: PromisE
Description: PromisE is an electrical system design software, used for electrical schematics. With PromisE automate tedious tasks found in traditional CAD-centric design can be created with PromisE and errors can be reduce with the intelligent model of PromisE that cross-references schematics, 2D layouts, 3D equipment models, and reports. Promote standards and consistency with a central database of symbols, parts, and templates. Speed collaboration with a project database to synch the work of multiple users.

Name: Global Mapper
Description: Global Mapper is a geographic information system (GIS) software that handles vector and raster geographic information as aerial imageries, terrain elevation, LIDAR and so on. It provides viewing, conversion and other general GIS features. It’s compatible with almost all the file formats for geographical information. It’s used to handle the aerial imageries of our customers’ resorts and to inspect the snow depth and GPS data during the software development.

Name: Postman Pro
Description:
Development environment for API.
Design, Document, Monitor and Test API https://htiglobal.postman.co

Name: Alpi Caneco BT
Description: Alpi Caneco BT is used by electrical engineers  to carry out electrical calculations, such as: - Cables and protections calculation according to country’s standard.   - Short Circuits current and Default current calculation (Ik Min, Ik Max, If, IB).   - Drop Voltage calculation (Upstream, Downstream, Total).   - Protective devices setting calculation (Magnetic, Thermal and Differential).   - Simultaneous calculation on Normal and generator supplies.
